roleset.name: write musical score for instruments

role.descr: music written or had instruments added to

example.name: instrumentate-v
example.text: He was so impressed by Anne - Sophie Mutter ’s violin playing at the first performance of Chain 2 in 1984 that he instrumentated a work for her that originally was for violin and piano – it became Partita ( 1988 )

propbank.arg: a work for her that originally was for violin and piano

example.name: instrumentation-n
example.text: perhaps the impressioin is enhanced by the very similar woodwind instrumentation of the movements , but the trio section of VW8 : ii prominently features an idea that ends on a repeated falling major second with the upper note held twice as long as the lower .

roleset.note: INSTRUMENTATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for unification.

roleset.name: serving as an aid

example.name: instrumental-j: With Args 0, 1
example.text: If Giffords is unable to recover fully before the next election , I think it would make sense that her second - in - command , or whomever has been most instrumental in the work that her office has been doing since the injury , goes ahead and runs in her place .

propbank.arg: in the work that her office has been doing since the injury

example.name: instrumental-j: All args
example.text: He was instrumental to me in my career as one of his subs and as a friend .

propbank.arg: in my career as one of his subs and as a friend

roleset.note: INSTRUMENTAL-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. Comparison to aid-v.01. (from instrumental.01-j)
